\section{Authorship}
\subsection{dasm}

\item Copyright \textcopyright 1995 by Olaf "Rhialto" Seibert.
\item Copyright \textcopyright 2003-2008 by Andrew Davie.
\item Copyright \textcopyright 2008 by Peter H. Froehlich.
\item Copyright \textcopyright 2019-2020 by the DASM team.
\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}
